markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs=""
>
[Winter Wolf Elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=103)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 550 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This elixir warms your core and improves your circulation. For 24 hours, you are protected from the effects of severe cold.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 4"
pfs="Standard"
>
Winter Wolf Elixir (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 550 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 15 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Winter Wolf Elixir (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 550 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 320 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You’re also protected from extreme cold.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 16"
pfs="Standard"
>
Winter Wolf Elixir (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 550 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,400 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You’re also protected from extreme and incredible cold.
name: Winter Wolf Elixir (Moderate)
